snippet: Sotheby’s will auction paintings, furniture and other works that belonged to Ralph O. Esmerian, the former chairman of the American Folk Art Museum, who is now imprisoned for financial fraud.
abstract: Sotheby’s will auction paintings, furniture and other works that belonged to Ralph O. Esmerian, the former chairman of the American Folk Art Museum, who is now imprisoned for financial fraud.

headline.main: Folk Art Collection From Imprisoned Former Museum Chairman Going to Auction
headline.print_headline: Auction Is Set for Folk Art Of Jailed Ex-Museum Chief
